experiences.companyDescription: THIQAH is a Saudi company specializing in smart solutions and creative services. Established in 2012, it has partnered with over 100 strategic partners and developed more than 60 smart technical projects, serving over 10 million users in approximately 26 countries. Recognized as one of Asia's top workplaces for 2024.
experiences.position: Staff Developer – Digital Innovation Unit, DevFusion Dep.
experiences.description: Member of the Technology Development leadership group, leading cross-functional engineering teams and driving strategic digital innovation initiatives.
responsibilities: Member of the Technology Development leadership group, contributing to technical strategy, departmental planning, and execution of OKRs across development teams
Lead and mentor a cross-functional team of 5 engineers, ensuring high-quality delivery, technical excellence, and alignment with business and product goals
Act as Frontend Technical Owner for key innovation projects, defining frontend architecture, Angular standards, and UI scalability strategies
Oversee and drive end-to-end delivery of multiple strategic products, from ideation and PoC to MVP and production readiness
Lead and execute new digital and AI-driven initiatives, aligning innovation efforts with organizational and product roadmaps
Contribute to establishing development standards, architectural guidelines, and technology stacks across frontend and full-stack domains
Founded and led the AI Integration & Adoption Unit, responsible for enabling AI capabilities within products and aligning development teams with AI and R&D initiatives
Translate ideas into Proofs of Concept (PoCs) and scalable MVPs, accelerating experimentation and reducing time-to-market
Led the frontend and technical delivery of products including iHealth, Quality Mate, and Business AI, integrating AI agents, automating workflows, and ensuring maintainable, scalable UI architectures
Provide strategic technical guidance and hands-on support to product engineering teams across frontend, backend, and AI integration
achievements: First Place, THIQAH Hackathon (2023): AI-powered voice recognition tool for accessibility
Second Place, Elm Company Hackathon (2025): Integrated AI solution using Nuha LLM, OpenAI LLM, LangChain, CrewAI, FastAPI, NestJS, Angular
iHealth Product Presentation at LEAP 2025: Showcased innovative healthcare solution
Successfully delivered multiple AI-driven MVPs
Established AI Integration & Adoption Unit

experiences.companyDescription: THIQAH is a Saudi company specializing in smart solutions and creative services. Established in 2012, it has partnered with over 100 strategic partners and developed more than 60 smart technical projects, serving over 10 million users in approximately 26 countries.
experiences.position: Staff Developer – Frontend Unit, Engineering Team
experiences.description: Led frontend architecture for enterprise Angular applications, ensuring scalable, performant, and well-structured frontends while mentoring engineers and aligning UI delivery with product goals.
responsibilities: Led frontend architecture for enterprise Angular projects, ensuring scalability, performance, and clean structure
Designed and maintained modular frontend structures aligned with product and business goals
Built and maintained reusable components and shared libraries to standardize UI development across teams
Maintained and upgraded frontend technologies, improving code quality and long-term maintainability
Provided technical guidance and hands-on support to frontend developers
Trained and mentored frontend engineers on architecture principles, best practices, and modern Angular patterns
Participated in technical interviews and evaluated candidates for frontend roles
Contributed to backend–frontend integration using TypeScript, NestJS, and ABP Framework
Supported CI/CD, containerization, and DevOps practices as part of the overall engineering process
achievements: Improved frontend scalability and consistency through reusable components and structured architecture
Elevated frontend code quality and team standards across projects
Strengthened team capability through mentorship and structured technical guidance
Established a scalable Design System and reusable frontend packages that standardized UI development, improved code consistency, and significantly reduced time-to-delivery.
